Title: Vanessa Cruz (No. 117)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Vincent Angell, Daniel Knauf, Amanda Kate Shuman (executive story editor), Brandon Margolis (story editor), Brandon Sonnier (story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: The task force tracks a provocative female Blacklister (guest star Ana de la Reguera), a frame-up artist who targets the wealthy elite. Tom (Ryan Eggold) pleads for Liz's (Megan Boone) help...
